Name: 拯救大魔王2:逆流 Falsemen2:Upstream
About the game: A fantasy game about the adventures of a villain. It has both narrative and open world gameplay modes. You will play the villain and begin your journey in a land that is ruled by an empire. I want to tell you, in 300,000 words, 'What is the villain?' And what we should do if we're the villain.
